appliedGuidelines.reason: Incorporated project priorities and security emphasis; existing content updated to align with priorities order.
Updated Spring Boot version and Java version to 2.8 and Java 16 as per project guidelines.
Updated access modifiers guideline to prefer public by default and minimize private, replacing contradictory tech stack content.
Confirmed design patterns usage aligns; existing content already applies aggressive pattern usage.
Removed contradictory encapsulation guideline from tech stack instruction to conform with project guideline preferring public implementation details.
Applied Spring Boot version 2.8 with Java 16 as per project guidelines, replacing tech stack's 3.x and Java 17+.
Updated configuration preference to properties over YAML, replacing contradictory YAML preference.
Replaced Spring Data JPA repository usage with project guideline to avoid Spring Data JPA repositories and prefer SQL prepared statements.
